trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 9th 2007
Summary: meteor splits into two stops in mid air and splits into four
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife,two daughters, dog and I were walking west on east 26 st toward our home at around senven twenty pm. It ws a clear night. as I walked west with my dog,I suddenly noticed an object that appeared to be a meteor. I called to my wife and kids and we observed the firebal. As the fireball made a descent, it split into two. After the split the two objects stopped in mid air and split into four to six object. one by one each object dissapeared in an orderly fashion, and reaappeared in a orderly fashion. it was spectacular. a few moments later the objects merged into one object and continued in a south western direction.
